com.communote.server.api.core.blog

Class BlogTO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.blog.BlogTO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreationBlogTO

    public class BlogTO
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Transfer object holding the details of a blog.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlogTO

        public BlogTO()
        Create a TO with default values.

      • BlogTO

        public BlogTO(boolean allCanRead,
              boolean allCanWrite,
              String title,
              boolean createSystemNotes)
        Create a new TO and set the provided members
        Parameters:
        allCanRead - true if all users are allowed to read, false otherwise
        allCanWrite - true if all users are allowed to write, false otherwise
        title - the title of the blog
        createSystemNotes - whether notes with creation source 'SYSTEM' can be created in the blog

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public void copy(BlogTO otherBean)
        Copies all properties from the argument value object into this value object.
        Parameters:
        otherBean - the other object to copy from

      • getChildTopicIds

        public Long[] getChildTopicIds()
        Returns:
        Array of id of child topics. This never returns null.

      • getCreatorUserId

        public Long getCreatorUserId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the user that creates the blog, this user will be the manager of the blog. This member should be ignored when using the TO for updating an existing blog.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Returns:
        the description for the blog.

      • getNameIdentifier

        public String getNameIdentifier()
        Returns:
        the unique alias of the blog.

      • getProperties

        public List<StringPropertyTO> getProperties()
        Returns:
        the properties to add or added to the blog

      • getProperty

        public StringPropertyTO getProperty(String keyGroup,
                                    String key)
        Find and return the property with matching values
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - the key group
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the property if found

      • getTags

        public Set<TagTO> getTags()
        Returns:
        the tags of the blog as a collection of TOs describing the tags

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        Returns:
        the title of the blog

      • getUnparsedTags

        public String[] getUnparsedTags()
        Returns:
        the tags of the blog as a an array of tag names

      • isAllCanRead

        public boolean isAllCanRead()
        Returns:
        whether all users are allowed to read the blog

      • isAllCanWrite

        public boolean isAllCanWrite()
        Returns:
        whether all users are allowed to write to the blog

      • isCreateSystemNotes

        public boolean isCreateSystemNotes()
        Returns:
        whether notes with creation source 'SYSTEM' can be created in the blog

      • isToplevelTopic

        public boolean isToplevelTopic()
        Returns:
        whether the topic is a top level topic

      • setAllCanRead

        public void setAllCanRead(boolean allCanRead)
        Set whether all users are allowed to read the blog
        Parameters:
        allCanRead - true if all users are allowed to read, false otherwise

      • setAllCanWrite

        public void setAllCanWrite(boolean allCanWrite)
        Set whether all users are allowed to write to the blog
        Parameters:
        allCanWrite - true if all users are allowed to write, false otherwise

      • setChildTopicIds

        public void setChildTopicIds(Long[] childTopicIds)
        Parameters:
        childTopicIds - Array of child topic ids.

      • setCreateSystemNotes

        public void setCreateSystemNotes(boolean createSystemNotes)
        Set whether notes with creation source 'SYSTEM' can be created in the blog
        Parameters:
        createSystemNotes - true if the notes can be created, false otherwise

      • setCreatorUserId

        public void setCreatorUserId(Long creatorUserId)
        Set the ID of the user that creates the blog, this user will be the manager of the blog.
        Parameters:
        creatorUserId - the ID of the creator

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(String description)
        Set the description of the blog.
        Parameters:
        description - a short description of the blog

      • setNameIdentifier

        public void setNameIdentifier(String nameIdentifier)
        Set the unique alias of the blog
        Parameters:
        nameIdentifier - the alias of the blog

        public void setProperties(List<StringPropertyTO> properties)
        The properties of the blog
        Parameters:
        properties - the blog properties

      • setTags

        public void setTags(Set<TagTO> tags)
        Set the tags of the blog
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags as a collection of TOs describing the tags

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(String title)
        Set the title of the blog
        Parameters:
        title - the blog title

      • setToplevelTopic

        public void setToplevelTopic(boolean toplevelTopic)
        Set whether the topic is a top level topic
        Parameters:
        toplevelTopic - true if the topic is a top level topic, otherwise false

        Set the tags of the blog.
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - the tags as an array of tag names
